Reviews.Title: Galaxy 551 - misleading info provided by Amazon
Reviews.Author: AR
Reviews.Content: I've ordered it for my daughter - was just looking for an unlocked QWERTY entry level Android. Got the phone the other day - i was ordering the one from Amazon. So what i've received was:- the phone itself: it is a not a factory unlocked version - it is a hacked / unlocked version of Orange (EU operator) phone, with Orange software (you can't uninstall this), Orange logos on it and the worst thing - not a QWERTY keyboard. This is a French version, so you get AZERTY keyboard, since French keyboard looks different.- what i've received in the box also left a strange impression: it was sent not in original box (at least Samsung was spelled correctly on the box), "hand-crafted" manual with a lot of spelling mistakes, the phone itself was not in original protective shields (looked like it was opened before), earphones in the packcage with English / GB marking, while charger was maked in French.Anyhow, this is still a good phone, and if you are ok with a French AZERTY keyboard and not a factory unlocked phone you may want to try it. Otherwise you may want to try the one from eBay. I will be returning the phone to Amazon, and will most most probably be looking for another phone from other vendors.

Reviews.Title: NOT a QWERTY keyboard!
Reviews.Author: Manda "Manda"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews, and saw that some people were saying it, and that some were getting a QWERTY, so I took a chance.  Sadly, I was not a winner, I did not get a QWERTY keyboard, I got what I can only describe as a French AZERTY keyboard.  Now it is too late to send it back for an exchange before Christmas.  Also know that the one I received was an "Orange" branded phone, and that it had been completely opened and mauled a bit, I am guessing that they simply bought a whole bunch of old French Orange cell phones in bulk, and are opening them, and "unlocking" them, and reselling them (or trying to, as they are knowingly misleading people with the bold letters QWERTY in the description).So in closing:Opened (box mauled, not suitable for a gift, unless you like giving people things that appear used).It is new (but man-handled during the unlock process).Looks like they may have been the "$1 with 2-year contract" phones from Orange (Orange branding everywhere).NOT a QWERTY keyboard. (I think it's french) Top row "AZERTYUIOP" Middle row "QSDFGHJKLM" Bottom row "WXCVBN"Not happy, as I was trying to get this as a gift for my daughter.  I would have paid more for a new factory unlocked phone if I was able to find one on Amazon, but this was the only Samsung Galaxy I5510 I could find so I took a chance.

Reviews.Title: great phone for the price
Reviews.Author: ERONyX
Reviews.Content: got the phone the other dayit's kind of hard to access the upper side of the keyboard buttons but the rest looks okfor the money spent looks to be a good oneAndroid is running smooth and picks the WiFi networks around

Reviews.Title: Good phone, unlocked, android 2.2 AZERTY keyboard
Reviews.Author: mariangelagz
Reviews.Content: The phone works perfectly has a beautiful desing and a good camera. It has the Android 2.2 which works really well and fast. The only thing is that the keyboard comes in the french desing that is instead of a QWERTY keyboard it is an AZERTY keyboard but is a matter of getting used to it. Good price. Good smartphone.I bought this phone from italy and I had to pay 35 euros in addition due to the taxes of the country beside to the expedition fee

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: Raid
Reviews.Content: I can not say other than: it is AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME, just one thing:On the preview images and on Back View it shows the SAMSUNG logo at the bottom and Google logo above it, I do not know why the Google logo wasn't there, it replaced with Android Logo, it doesn't matter for me if there is Google logo or Android logo, but it will be better if they will put exactly images for the product.It is awesome, everything works GREAT and SILKY SMOOTH, I bought one and now I ordered two more. I really recommend it for everyone.Thanks;

Reviews.Title: Exelent phone
Reviews.Author: Jonas Maimone
Reviews.Content: Exelent phone i order two phones and i just love it the android run smooth and the keyboard is QWERTY as the seller said. android is the best

Reviews.Title: great value for the phone,  but the charger came broken & useless, & all manuals in french
Reviews.Author: Jean C. "Jean C."
Reviews.Content: great value, android runs very smooth, it cames in its box with all accessories, perfectly unlocked for my country & operator (VENEZUELA - Movilnet), just needed to insert my SIM card & the APN local configuration to run internet and no problem... honestly i was very happy with my purchase, until after using it and need to recharge the battery.... and NOTHING...CHARGER CAME BROKEN & USELESS. after a deep review I noticed one of the PINS of the charger was damaged or missing, so it wont charge anything.... :other CONs is all manuals & information of this cellphone came in french! even the charger originaly is european. with a little adapter, thats not a problem for me, because it came with it, but the real problem was the damaged charger. i was a few days on vacation and didnt noticed that when still on U.S.A and didnt returnt it, now im back on my country, and FORTUNATELY, was not the cellphone, just the charger, so i spend like 15$ to buy a replacement...so, to resume: I LIKE A LOT THE CELLPHONE, android runs great, but it came with a damaged accesory and all in french documentation & manuals....

Reviews.Title: Look's great  Has everything I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: WillColston
Reviews.Content: I actually haven't used the phone yet but it looks great and was delivered on time.  It's one of the few phones that meets all my selection criteria, and it's a Samsung, a brand I trust, at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Very poor quality
Reviews.Author: A Woman
Reviews.Content: This phone didn't come in the original packet. Seemed like refurbished even though I bought it as new. The battery doesn't last long (a day at most) and there is a problem with the radio, because the reception is very poor. Most of the time there is no connection at all, which makes it a useless phone. I would give it zero star if I could.

Reviews.Title: it's the best for 50 agers.
Reviews.Author: Maria Ines Amoretti
Reviews.Content: It has a big screen and a big keypad as well. I can see both! without eye glasses. I'd prefer more internal storage capacity.

Reviews.Title: Didn't receive the exact order
Reviews.Author: Maatallah
Reviews.Content: I ordered a samsung galaxy 551 i5510 unlocked international version but I received i5510m North American versionIt's so disappointing

Reviews.Title: My review hveraw I5510
Reviews.Author: Hildemaro Jesus Vera Weeden "Hildemaro"
Reviews.Content: This phone has some technical limitations of internal memory but overall is a good phone to start, I recommend for you

Reviews.Title: Great screen
Reviews.Author: Marcelo
Reviews.Content: The product was delivered as expected. Only issue is that one of the models had problems with the screen and that made the experience not good.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was expecting.
Reviews.Author: Glenda Otto
Reviews.Content: There was no owners manual included & instructions online did not totally match.  Difficult to program. I do like the slide out keyboard , but I have difficulty sliding the lock to open when the phone is ringing. It is not as large as I was expecting.I finally got the voice mail set up but still unable to get email. I would not recommend it to my friends unless they are a whiz with electronics.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't
Reviews.Author: JBr. "Sociologist"
Reviews.Content: Well, this phone is.... weird. It turns itself off, even though the battery is charged, it forgets to set the screen lock - then out of nowhere the screen lock reappears, it dies and will not resuscitate for a while - then when you think that is it, the end, it starts working fine again. After a year using this phone, I must say I am not really impressed. It works, but sometimes it doesn't. Now I think it really is getting completely insane and will stop working soon - so not sure it was worth what I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: MIIGUEL
Reviews.Content: This cell phone is great, comes with all the necessary functions and gadgets, well built, responsive touch screen,  good design, plus sliding full qwerty keyboard, the only flaw I see on this phone is the lack of better camera & flash, also the missing front camera for video calls, but since this is a medium range price product I think its way much better than what you expect to receive.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 551 sell HassleFreeCell
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: are irresponsible, they are selling a 551 samsung qwerty keyboard that is not specified according to the item description, IS FRANCES KEYBOARD AZERTY...the seller's HassleFreeCell response was:I am so sorry about this but I check with Samsung all of the international version of this model is coming with the France type azerty.

Reviews.Title: Samsung i5510 - Be aware of AZERTY keyboard
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I've ordered this phone from 2 different sellers. Each time, the phone has arrived with a keyboard that is laid out different from standard US QWERTY keyboard. The item description shows QWERTY keyboard. The physical keyboard on the phone is AZERTY, which means a few keys are rearranged. A and Q are swapped. W and Z are swapped. The M is moved to the right of L. I wanted the slide out keyboard for easy texting, which is very difficult with some keys in the wrong places. The phone does have a pop-up on screen keyboard, which is QWERTY, when you close the slide out. But that defeats the purpose of the slide-out.Other than the keyboard, the phone is my first Android phone. It seems to work well. No complaints about the functionality, or the software.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: customerreview
Reviews.Content: A great phone and it was shipped way sooner than expected! I had no problems switching my old number and use the data connection! Can only recommend after a lot of less fun experiences with my main carrier!

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: caskoar
Reviews.Content: I like the phone but sometimes I have a problem with the capitalization. It would stay capitalized for a while.
